content.heroIntro:
Discover Villa MIR0159, an exceptional new build villa nestled in the exclusive Portichol - Balcón al Mar area of Jávea. This stunning 4-bedroom property represents the perfect fusion of contemporary Mediterranean architecture and luxury living, commanding breathtaking sea views from its elevated position. Designed by renowned developer Miralbo Urbana S.L., this villa offers 227m² of meticulously crafted living space set within a generous 1,244m² plot, creating an oasis of privacy and sophistication.

Positioned in one of Jávea's most coveted locations, Villa MIR0159 captures the essence of Costa Blanca luxury living. The property's thoughtful design maximizes the spectacular Mediterranean vistas while ensuring seamless indoor-outdoor living. From the moment you step inside, the villa's bright, open-plan layout and premium finishes create an atmosphere of refined elegance, making this an unmissable opportunity for discerning buyers seeking their dream home in Spain's premier coastal destination.

locationSection.intro:
Portichol - Balcón al Mar represents the pinnacle of Jávea living, situated between the dramatic cliffs of Cabo de la Nao and the pristine beaches that have made this area legendary among international property buyers. This exclusive enclave offers unparalleled privacy while remaining just minutes from Jávea's vibrant town center, world-class restaurants, and the famous Arenal beach. The elevated position provides residents with panoramic sea views extending to Ibiza on clear days, while the surrounding natural park ensures your investment is protected by strict building regulations.

Jávea itself stands as the crown jewel of the Costa Blanca, where ancient history meets modern sophistication. The town's unique microclimate, protected by the Montgó Natural Park, ensures over 300 days of sunshine annually and mild winters that attract residents year-round. With excellent international schools, a thriving expat community, and direct access to both Alicante and Valencia airports within an hour's drive, Jávea offers the perfect balance of tranquil coastal living and urban convenience.
highlights: Walking distance to the exclusive Granadella beach, consistently rated among Spain's best
Minutes from Jávea's historic old town with authentic tapas bars and local markets
Close proximity to world-class golf courses including La Sella and Oliva Nova
Easy access to luxury marinas at Jávea port and nearby Denia
Surrounded by hiking trails in the protected Montgó Natural Park landscape

propertyFeatures.intro: Villa MIR0159 showcases contemporary Mediterranean design at its finest, with every detail carefully considered to maximize comfort, functionality, and the stunning natural setting. The property's intelligent layout places four generous bedrooms on the upper level for ultimate privacy, while the ground floor seamlessly integrates living, dining, and kitchen areas to create the perfect environment for both relaxation and entertaining.
features: Four spacious bedrooms with built-in wardrobes and private en-suite bathrooms
Open-plan living area with floor-to-ceiling windows maximizing sea views
State-of-the-art kitchen with premium appliances and sleek contemporary finishes
Multiple terraces and outdoor spaces totaling over 100m² for al fresco dining
Private swimming pool area with sun deck overlooking the Mediterranean
Landscaped gardens designed to complement the natural Mediterranean environment
High-end finishes throughout including premium flooring and fitted wardrobes
Pre-installation for air conditioning and heating systems
Private parking area and storage spaces within the generous plot
Energy-efficient design meeting latest Spanish building regulations

content.investmentSection:
Villa MIR0159 represents an exceptional investment opportunity in one of Europe's most stable and sought-after property markets. Jávea's luxury property sector has demonstrated consistent growth over the past decade, with new build villas in prime locations like Portichol commanding premium rental rates during peak season. Properties of this caliber typically achieve rental yields of 5-7% annually, with the potential for significant capital appreciation driven by limited building land and increasing international demand from Northern European buyers seeking permanent or second homes.

The combination of Jávea's year-round appeal, excellent infrastructure, and this villa's prime location creates a compelling investment proposition. The property's proximity to beaches, restaurants, and cultural attractions ensures strong rental demand, while the generous plot size and sea views provide inherent value that appreciates over time. With Brexit driving increased interest from UK buyers and remote working trends boosting demand for luxury Spanish properties, Villa MIR0159 offers both immediate enjoyment and long-term financial security in one of the Mediterranean's most prestigious locations.
whyBuySection: Unparalleled sea views from an elevated position in Jávea's most exclusive area
New build quality with 10-year structural warranty from established developer Miralbo Urbana
Prime location minutes from Granadella beach and Jávea's finest restaurants

Move-in ready with premium finishes and modern amenities throughout

Protected investment with strict building regulations preserving area exclusivity

faqs.question: What is the total price for Villa MIR0159 and what payment terms are available?
faqs.answer: Villa MIR0159 is priced at €2,565,000. As a new build property from Miralbo Urbana, flexible payment terms are typically available including stage payments during construction. We can arrange mortgage financing through our Habeno partnership to secure competitive rates for international buyers.

faqs.question: How close is Villa MIR0159 to Jávea's beaches and amenities?
faqs.answer: The villa is located in Portichol - Balcón al Mar, just minutes from the famous Granadella beach and a short drive to Jávea's town center. You'll have easy access to the Arenal beach, port area with restaurants and marina, plus excellent shopping and international schools.

faqs.question: What is the buying process for international buyers purchasing this villa?
faqs.answer: The process typically takes 6-8 weeks and includes obtaining a Spanish NIE number, opening a Spanish bank account, and arranging legal representation. We guide you through each step and can recommend trusted lawyers and tax advisors specializing in Spanish property purchases.

faqs.question: Can you help arrange mortgage financing for Villa MIR0159?
faqs.answer: Yes, we partner with Habeno to provide competitive mortgage solutions for international buyers. Spanish banks typically offer mortgages up to 70% of the property value for non-residents, with attractive rates currently available for qualified buyers.

faqs.question: What rental income potential does this villa offer?
faqs.answer: Premium villas in this area of Jávea typically achieve €3,000-5,000 per week during peak season, with strong demand year-round. The combination of sea views, modern amenities, and prime location makes Villa MIR0159 highly attractive to luxury rental markets.

faqs.question: When will Villa MIR0159 be completed and available for occupation?
faqs.answer: As this is a new build project by Miralbo Urbana, completion timelines will be confirmed upon reservation. Typically, construction takes 12-18 months from groundbreaking, with stage payments aligned to construction milestones.

faqs.question: What fixtures, fittings, and appliances are included in the purchase price?
faqs.answer: The villa includes a fully fitted kitchen with premium appliances, built-in wardrobes, bathroom fixtures, air conditioning pre-installation, and landscaped gardens. Full specifications are available upon request, with options for upgrades during construction.

faqs.question: How can I arrange a viewing of Villa MIR0159 and the Portichol area?
faqs.answer: We can arrange private viewings of the development site and show you similar completed properties in the area. Contact us via WhatsApp or call +34 634 044 970 to schedule your visit to this exclusive Jávea location.

faqs.question: What makes Portichol - Balcón al Mar special compared to other areas in Jávea?
faqs.answer: This exclusive enclave offers the perfect combination of privacy, sea views, and proximity to Jávea's best beaches. The elevated position provides stunning Mediterranean vistas while remaining close to Granadella beach and the town center, making it one of the most coveted addresses on the Costa Blanca.

faqs.question: Are there any additional costs or fees beyond the purchase price?
faqs.answer: Additional costs typically include 10% IVA (VAT) for new builds, legal fees (1-2%), notary and registry fees, and annual property taxes. We provide a detailed breakdown of all costs upfront so you can budget accurately for your Villa MIR0159 purchase.

content.conclusion: Villa MIR0159 represents a rare opportunity to secure a premium new build villa in one of Jávea's most exclusive locations. With its stunning sea views, contemporary design, and prime Portichol - Balcón al Mar address, this property offers the perfect blend of luxury living and investment potential. Don't miss your chance to own this exceptional piece of Costa Blanca paradise - contact us today via WhatsApp or call +34 634 044 970 to arrange your private viewing and take the first step toward your Mediterranean dream home.
